About
Me

Hello! I am a designer, front-end developer, and photographer based in Lincoln. Currently, I am an Information Assistant for the USDA National Agroforestry Center, where I do everything from laying out publications and creating custom graphics to developing web-based tools to help users access information more easily. In 2018, I successully completed the USDA Forest Service National New Leader Program.

I truly enjoy problem solving being creative &emdash; which is why you'll see a multitude of projects in my portfolio. I'm a firm believer that the skills from each of the categories: Design, Web Development, and Photography overlap within another. This overlap allows me to gain perspective of what is truly needed when I begin a project.

Since 2013, I have also been freelance photographer. I've worked with my clients to capture birthdays, weddings, 5k races, products, portraits specializing in event and portrait photography. I've captured birthdays, weddings, running events.
